seo.title: Getting to Riomaggiore 2025 | Train, Car & Ferry Guide
seo.description: Complete guide to reaching Riomaggiore. Train connections, driving directions, parking info, and ferry schedules for the southernmost Cinque Terre village.

body.title: Gateway to Cinque Terre
body.subtitle: The southernmost village is easy to reach by train from La Spezia. No car needed - the train station is in the heart of the village.

features.title: By Train (Best Option)
features.description: Direct trains from La Spezia (10 min), Genoa (2 hrs), Pisa (2.5 hrs). Station in village center

features.title: By Car
features.description: Drive to La Spezia, park at Park & Ride, take train to Riomaggiore. Village is car-free

features.title: Parking Options
features.description: Limited paid parking above village (steep walk down). Better to use La Spezia Park & Ride

features.title: By Boat
features.description: Seasonal ferry from La Spezia, Portovenere, and Lerici. Scenic arrival at the harbor

features.title: From Airports
features.description: Pisa (closest), Genoa, or Milan airports. Take train to La Spezia, then local train

features.title: Getting Around
features.description: Walk everywhere in the village. Train or boat to other Cinque Terre villages

body.title: Plan Your Visit
body.description: Once you arrive, use our maps to navigate the village and trails.
